deleteAllowance(address,address).details: Allows to remove the allowance for a specific delegate and token. This will set all values except the `nonce` to 0.

params.delegate: Delegate whose allowance should be updated.

executeAllowanceTransfer(address,address.details: Allows to use the allowance to perform a transfer.

params.delegate: Delegate whose allowance should be updated.
params.payment: Amount to should be paid for executing the transfer.
params.paymentToken: Token that should be used to pay for the execution of the transfer.
params.safe: The Safe whose funds should be used.
params.signature: Signature generated by the delegate to authorize the transfer.
params.to: Address that should receive the tokens.

generateTransferHash(address,address,add.details: Generates the transfer hash that should be signed to authorize a transfer

getChainId().details: Returns the chain id used by this contract.

params.removeAllowances: Indicator if allowances should also be removed. This should be set to `true` unless this causes an out of gas, in this case the allowances should be "manually" deleted via `deleteAllowance`.

resetAllowance(address,address).details: Allows to reset the allowance for a specific delegate and token.

params.delegate: Delegate whose allowance should be updated.

setAllowance(address,address,uint96,uint.details: Allows to update the allowance for a specified token. This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

params.delegate: Delegate whose allowance should be updated.
params.resetBaseMin: Time based on which the reset time should be increased
params.resetTimeMin: Time after which the allowance should reset
